name: International Services Association, INSA/India
briefDescription: The International Services Association is a non governmental secular organisation established in 1982 to strengthen involvement and approaches of non governmental and governmental organisations towards national and international health and development targets. INSA India pilots innovation with the philosophy that cost- effective, sustainable processes for wholistic health is possible when health and development are seen as two sides of a coin. As a result of our work, over 700 organisations are now well recognised for addressing priority challenges in their areas.
